Articles.Content:
Today this popped up.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Is this a new easter-egg (like the sand castle)? Or was it added by one of my mods. It never showed up before today.

You guessed correctly - this was added by a mod (Toolbar). And there have been at least a dozen threads about it already, so don't feel bad when this gets locked. The mod creator really needs to make an explanation dialog after you start the game...

This AGAIN? You're literally the second person to post this within 12 hours.

... The mod creator really needs to make an explanation dialog after you start the game...

No. People should search the forum before posting things like this.
As said above, please do a search before posting a new thread. We must have two dozen threads about this already. Closed.
